text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali discusses with Palesinian leader Yasser Arafat obstacles facing the Palestinian cause in light of the new Israeli government's hardline policy.
- Tunisia names new heads for state-run firms in transports, industry and agriculture.
- President Ben Ali recommends to ease proceedings at ports and airports to facilitate trade exchanges.
